item.title: IOVA
item.description: score:33 Chances: Iovance’s lead pipeline drug is anticipated to receive FDA approval as the first individualized, one-time cell therapy for certain patients with melanoma. The company is focused on innovating, developing, and delivering novel polyclonal tumor infiltrating lymphocyte (TIL) therapies for patients with cancer.
